languages.text: "Помогу тебе расправиться с врагами, осадившими твой дом, а затем отправлюсь по координатам, что дал мне Торбальд. Знаю, эттфатер, что если позову с собой — ты не устрашишься примкнуть ко мне в поисках, но... Место, куда я собираюсь лететь, и впрямь страшно и смертоносно. Мало кто сможет там выжить, и пусть меня туда ведет долг, я не желаю, чтобы он был оплачен твоей кровью".

"Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."
languages.original_text: "Помогу тебе расправиться с врагами, осадившими твой дом, а затем отправлюсь по координатам, что дал мне Торбальд. Знаю, эттфатер, что если позову с собой — ты не устрашишься примкнуть ко мне в поисках, но... Место, куда я собираюсь лететь, и впрямь страшно и смертоносно. Мало кто сможет там выжить, и пусть меня туда ведет долг, я не желаю, чтобы он был оплачен твоей кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a dread and perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

"Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a dread and perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

"Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a dread and perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

"Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

languages.text: «Ayudarle a librarse de los enemigos que asediaron su hogar y después acudir a las coordenadas indicadas por Thorbald. Aett-Vater, sé bien que no conoce el miedo y que no tengo más que pedírselo para que me acompañe en mi misión, pero... el viaje que me espera es peligroso. Pocos pueden sobrevivir a él y, aunque el destino me conmina a emprenderlo, no quiero pagar mi deuda con su sangre».
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: «Ayudarle a librarse de los enemigos que asediaron su hogar y después acudir a las coordenadas indicadas por Thorbald. Aett-Vater, sé bien que no conoce el miedo y que no tengo más que pedírselo para que me acompañe en mi misión, pero... el viaje que me espera es terrible y peligroso. Pocos pueden sobrevivir a él y, aunque el destino me conmina a emprenderlo, no quiero pagar mi deuda con su sangre».

languages.text: “帮你对付那群打到家门的敌人，然后前往索巴德给我的坐标。我知道你无所畏惧，狼领。只要我一句话，你愿意和我一起去寻找。不过……我要去的地方非常可怕，充满危险，极少有人能在存活下来。尽管我的责任指引我去那里，但我不想用你的鲜血来偿还我的债务。”
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: “帮你对付那群打到家门的敌人，然后前往索巴德给我的坐标。我知道你无所畏惧，狼领。只要我一句话，你愿意和我一起去寻找。不过……我要去的地方非常可怕，充满危险，极少有人能在存活下来。尽管我的责任指引我去那里，但我不想用你的鲜血来偿还我的债务。”

languages.text: 「あんたの家を取り囲んでる敵に対処する手伝いをしてから、トールバルドがくれた座標の位置に向かう。アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたが勇敢なのは知ってるし、俺が一言頼めば探索の手伝いをしてくれるだろう。だが…俺が行く場所は危険な場所なんだ。生き残れる者はほとんどいない。俺は義務を果たすためそこへ行くが、あんたへの貸しをその血で払ってほしくはない」
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの家を取り囲んでる敵に対処する手伝いをしてから、トールバルドがくれた座標の位置に向かう。アエット＝ヴァテル、あんたが勇敢なのは知ってるし、俺が一言頼めば探索の手伝いをしてくれるだろう。だが…俺が行く場所は恐ろしく危険な場所なんだ。生き残れる者はほとんどいない。俺は義務を果たすためそこへ行くが、あんたへの貸しをその血で払ってほしくはない」

languages.text: « Je vais vous aider à régler leur compte aux ennemis qui ont assiégé votre fief, après quoi je me rendrai sur les lieux indiqués par Thorbald. Intrépide comme vous l'êtes, aett-vater, je sais bien qu'il me suffirait d'un mot pour que vous m'accompagniez dans ma quête, mais... ma destination est très dangereuse. Rares sont ceux qui peuvent y survivre, et si le devoir m'y appelle, je refuse que vous payiez ma dette de votre sang. »
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous aider à régler leur compte aux ennemis qui ont assiégé votre fief, après quoi je me rendrai sur les lieux indiqués par Thorbald. Intrépide comme vous l'êtes, aett-vater, je sais bien qu'il me suffirait d'un mot pour que vous m'accompagniez dans ma quête, mais... ma destination est aussi dangereuse qu'effroyable. Rares sont ceux qui peuvent y survivre, et si le devoir m'y appelle, je refuse que vous payiez ma dette de votre sang. »

languages.text: "Euch helfen, die Feinde zu bezwingen, die Eure Heimat belagert haben. Und mich dann zu den Koordinaten begeben, die Thorbald mir gegeben hat. Nun, Aett-Vater, ich weiß, dass Ihr furchtlos seid, und dass Ihr meine Suche unterstützen würdet, wenn ich nur ein einziges Wort sage, doch ... ich reise an einen gefährlichen Ort. Nur wenige können dort überleben, und auch wenn meine Pflicht mich hinführt, möchte ich nicht, dass meine Schuld mit Eurem Blut bezahlt wird."
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: "Euch helfen, die Feinde zu bezwingen, die Eure Heimat belagert haben. Und mich dann zu den Koordinaten begeben, die Thorbald mir gegeben hat. Nun, Aett-Vater, ich weiß, dass Ihr furchtlos seid, und dass Ihr meine Suche unterstützen würdet, wenn ich nur ein einziges Wort sage, doch ... ich reise an einen grausamen, gefährlichen Ort. Nur wenige können dort überleben, und auch wenn meine Pflicht mich hinführt, möchte ich nicht, dass meine Schuld mit Eurem Blut bezahlt wird."

languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

languages.text: "Yuvanı kuşatan düşmanların üstesinden gelmene yardım edeceğim. Sonra Thorbald'ın bana verdiği koordinatlara gideceğim. Senin nasıl korkusuz biri olduğunu ve istersem arayışımda bana katılacağını bilirim Aett-Vater. Fakat gideceğim yer tekinsizdir, çok az kişi sağ kalabilir. Görev beni oraya çağırsa da borcumu senin kanınla ödemek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Help you to deal with the enemies who besieged your home, and then head for the coordinates that Thorbald gave me. Well I know, Aett-Vater, that you are dauntless, and if I but say the word, you will join me in my seeking, but... the place I will voyage to is a perilous one. Few can survive in it, and though duty leads me there, I do not want my debt to be paid with your blood."

traits.locale_text: "Yuvanı kuşatan düşmanların üstesinden gelmene yardım edeceğim. Sonra Thorbald'ın bana verdiği koordinatlara gideceğim. Görev beni oraya çağırsa da borcumu senin kanınla ödemek istemiyorum."
